website_summaries.verdict: A premium multi-layer memory foam mattress from a long-time industry leader.
pros: Multiple layers address sleep concerns for hot sleepers and those with joint pain with sacrificing the firmness you'd want on a nightly basis
Quick and easy delivery and installation
Highly rated by industry and consumers alike
cons: One of the highest prices we've seen for a foam-only mattress

customer_reviews.title: The Best Investment for Your Health
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bed! With the adjustments and different modes of vibration, you never turn over! You are lulled to sleep and awaken refreshed without stiff joints anywhere! A wonderful investment for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: wise owl

customer_reviews.title: I need to change it for a bigger mattress
customer_reviews.text: Is not what was advertised! The mattress I had before I bought your mattress was way better than your over rated mattress and by the way I used it for over 15 years. What I got was not what I intended. I needed 6 inches but was sold 3 and I don’t like it all
customer_reviews.author: Patrick O.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I made for myself
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I’ve ever slept on. Tempurpedic is worth every penny for my back and very comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Sok

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We've been sleeping on this bed for almost a month now. We used to wake up sore every morning and I had a lot of trouble sleeping but now I lay down and immediately feel comfortable enough to sleep. We also never feel sore like we used to. So for now I'd say this mattress is great although very expensive and probably not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order !!!!
customer_reviews.text: After finally getting this. I’ve discovered that only 1 section of the split king has arrived ! Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: like sleeping on a cushi cloud....that much nice to sleep on!
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is comfortable but after a couple of years in starts to ...
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is comfortable but after a couple of years in starts to sag and the foundation falls apart. Will find any reason not to cover under warranty. BUYER BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: lee carraway

customer_reviews.title: Not a recommended purchase
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today....while sold as having a 6 inch mattress, clearly it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Saunders

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY A TEMPER PIDIC
customer_reviews.text: after 4 years , this bed is so soft it actually pulled my back out , others have said the same , don't waste ur money ..great at first but for over 2500 much better out there , and THE COMPANY KNOWS IT
customer_reviews.author: BK NEW YORK

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Bed
customer_reviews.text: At 48 i believed the negativity of when you age aches and pains start around my age so i just suffered with little aches and pains, i was sleeping on a pillow top mattress and sometimes on the couch. anyway, after sleeping on this tempur pedic mattress all of my aches and pains are gone. its like a miracle, my body feels like i'm 25 again, no aches or pains. i get complete rest when sleeping on this mattress and getting out of bed is easy with this mattress as my other pillow top mattress is a struggle too even get out of. i highly recommend this tempur pedic mattress and it surpassed my highest expectations. awesome bed. Beach'n
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is useless... they do not stand behind their product and warranty is useless...
customer_reviews.text: mattress is hot and foam sags badly making is uncomfortable to sleep on... don't waste money on a high priced mattress with a horrible warranty
customer_reviews.author: John Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The mattress did not last over two years when it started sagging and collapsing in on itself. It ended up being a big waste of money for an inferior product. My wife objected to the brand right from the start because of its sexist logo, but we ended up trying the mattress, and were so disappointed in the quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then iComfort for us!
customer_reviews.text: Best night's sleep in a long time. Our last expensive high quality mattress was the iComfort. Unfortunately, after about 1 year, the mattress began breaking down making very soft dips where our bodies lay at night losing permanent firmness. We kept it since we were financing it, but now it was time to try Tempur-Pedic. We could not be happier! It's firm and very comfortable providing great support where needed. I have several slipped discs including one in my neck and this has been the best mattress for relief that I have ever slept on. Combined with using the 'my pillow', we are finally getting true rest at night. Hopefully it keeps its firmness more than a year!
customer_reviews.author: ByTheSea

customer_reviews.title: I feel like many of these mattresses aren't accurate in their soft/firm ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like many of these mattresses aren't accurate in their soft/firm descriptions, but this one is true to its description. It legitimately feels medium soft and its obvious the first moment you touch it. The design is plush but clean, easy to get bed sheets over it without help. The price though? I feel like you're paying for the brand more than anything else. It's not a miracle mattress, I've had more comfortable beds for lower rates. Much much lower rates.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Firm and flexible (if that's possible)
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is solid...at first. Then, it molds to your body. It's very different from my previous soft pillow top mattress, which I would describe as cloud-like. This is more sand-like, despite the name. The mattress' construction is such that movement on one side is barely felt on the other side. This might be the best aspect for married couples who have a tough time syncing. A TEMPUR box spring might make everything work even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and firm.
customer_reviews.text: How can a mattress be soft and firm at the same time? It is so comfortable and back pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Littau, author

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Ever
customer_reviews.text: There was a fire in my building. I slept through it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TEMPUR‐Cloud Prima Medium-Soft Mattress, Luxury Cooling Memory Foam Layers, Queen, Made in USA, 10 Year Warranty
product_meta.description: Size:QueenPower your sleep with a TEMPUR-Cloud Prima Mattress, a 10-inch medium-soft mattress from Tempur-Pedic. The TEMPUR-Cloud Collection offers plush softness paired with the adaptive support and pressure relief of TEMPUR material. Sink into a cushiony sleep with extra-plush layers of TEMPUR material on top and a supportive core that adapts to your shape. TEMPUR-Cloud Prima starts with soft comfort and famous TEMPUR bed support to distribute your body weight. The Cloud Prima is covered in a high-loft super-stretch cover with grey upholstered sides. The SmartClimate System is built with an innovative two-layer construction that helps you stay comfortable while sleeping. The fibers in the top cover draw the moisture away while the SmartClimate System treament in the inner cover provides the cool to-the-touch comfort. Constructed from an extra-soft TEMPUR-ES material, the top layer determines the mattress' feel and works with the Support Layer to allow for personalized comfort and support. The Support Layer is formulated from TEMPUR material to provide support for your body and helps distribute body weight evenly across the mattress. The Base supports the TEMPUR material layers above it and is designed to disperse heat from the mattress. Every TEMPUR mattress is designed to work with a firm stable foundation or an adjustable base. Queen measures 80" L x 60" W x 10" H. Backed by a 10-year limited , the TEMPUR-Cloud Prima is a great entry-point into the Tempur-Pedic bed experience. Availible in Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King, and Split California King sizes.
feature_bullets: 10-INCH CLOUD MATTRESS: The TEMPUR-Cloud Prima is a medium-soft memory foam mattress that offers plush softness on top paired with the adaptive support and pressure relief of TEMPUR Material.
COOLING TECHNOLOGY: The fibers in the top cover draw moisture away while the SmartClimate System in the inner cover provides cool to-the-touch comfort.
PERSONALIZED COMFORT & SUPPORT: The Support Layer is formulated from proprietary TEMPUR Material that helps distribute your body weight evenly across the queen mattress.
EASY TO SET UP: Every Tempur-Pedic memory foam mattress is designed to work with a firm stable foundation or an adjustable base.
QUEEN SIZE MATTRESS: Measures 80" L x 60" W x 10" H. Backed by a 10-year limited warranty, the TEMPUR-Cloud Prima is a great entry-point into the Tempur-Pedic bed experience.
100 NIGHT RISK-FREE TRIAL: IF YOU ARE UNSATISFIED WITH THIS MATTRESS, YOU ARE ELIGIBLE FOR A FULL REFUND UP TO 100 DAYS FROM DATE OF RECEIPT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars52 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: This limited warranty is valid only in connection with the original purchase of new products from authorized retailers and extends from the original purchase date of the original product purchased. An “original purchaser,” for the purposes of this limited warranty, is an individual or entity who purchases the product directly from tempur-pedic or an authorized retailer of tempur-pedic with the intent to use the product for personal consumer use and not for commercial or industrial use and not with the intent to resell the product. An “authorized retailer,” for purposes of this limited warranty, is an individual or entity authorized by tempur-pedic to sell product directly to original purchasers. An individual or entity that purchases the product from whatever source with the intent to resell the product is an unauthorized reseller
